mapper.update: update t_asset_lease_record set operation = 10, deleted = 1, update_time = now() where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select alr.id, alr.asset_id, alr.asset_type, alr.tenant_uid, alr.title, alr.type_code, alr.advantage_id, alr.image_url, alr.summarize, alr.direction_id, alr.price, alr.operation, alr.create_time, u.real_name, u.avatar_url from t_asset_lease_record alr left join t_user u on u.uid = alr.tenant_uid where alr.asset_id = #{assetId} and alr.asset_type = #{assetType} and alr.home_owner_uid = #{homeOwnerUid}
and alr.deleted = 0 and alr.operation in (1, 9)
and alr.deleted = 0 and alr.operation in (2, 3, 4, 5, 31, 32)
and alr.deleted = 0 and alr.operation = 6
and alr.deleted = 1 and alr.operation = 10
